title: LINDAS Dataset Catalog
description: Curated catalog of Swiss open data cubes. Browse by category and click to visualize.

options.content:
LINDAS Dataset Catalog

Swiss Linked Data Service - Open Government Data

Select a dataset below to explore and create visualizations

### Water Quality

**[Bathing Water Quality](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://environment.ld.admin.ch/foen/ubd01041prod/6)**
Assessment of bathing waters based on hygienic quality indicators.
*Federal Office for the Environment*

---

### Air Quality

**[Air Quality Measurements](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://environment.ld.admin.ch/foen/mf008/4)**
Measurement stations tracking air quality across Switzerland.
*Federal Office for the Environment*

---

### Climate

**[Climate Indicators](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://environment.ld.admin.ch/foen/climate)**
Swiss climate change indicators and measurements.
*Federal Office for the Environment*

### Electricity

**[Electricity Indicators](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://energy.ld.admin.ch/elcom/sunshine-median)**
Key efficiency indicators including price trends.
*Federal Electricity Commission*

---

**[Indicators by Category](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://energy.ld.admin.ch/elcom/sunshine-cat)**
Electricity indicators organized by category.
*Federal Electricity Commission*

---

### Energy Production

**[Renewable Energy](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://energy.ld.admin.ch/sfoe/renewable)**
Renewable energy production statistics.
*Swiss Federal Office of Energy*

### Population

**[Population Statistics](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/bfs/population)**
Swiss population data by canton, age, and gender.
*Federal Statistical Office*

---

### Health

**[Health Indicators](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/bfs/health)**
Public health statistics and indicators.
*Federal Statistical Office*

---

### Education

**[Education Statistics](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/bfs/education)**
Education levels and enrollment data.
*Federal Statistical Office*

### Economic Indicators

**[GDP Statistics](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/seco/gdp)**
Gross domestic product and economic growth.
*State Secretariat for Economic Affairs*

---

### Employment

**[Labor Market](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/seco/employment)**
Employment and unemployment statistics.
*State Secretariat for Economic Affairs*

---

### Trade

**[Foreign Trade](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/bazg/trade)**
Import and export statistics.
*Federal Office for Customs*

### Rail Transport

**[SBB Punctuality](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/sbb/punctuality)**
Train punctuality and performance data.
*Swiss Federal Railways*

---

### Road Traffic

**[Traffic Statistics](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/astra/traffic)**
Road traffic volumes and accidents.
*Federal Roads Office*

---

### Aviation

**[Airport Statistics](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/bazl/aviation)**
Passenger and flight statistics.
*Federal Office of Civil Aviation*

### Agriculture

**[Agricultural Production](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/blw/agriculture)**
Crop and livestock production data.
*Federal Office for Agriculture*

---

### Forestry

**[Forest Statistics](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://environment.ld.admin.ch/foen/forest)**
Forest coverage and timber production.
*Federal Office for the Environment*

---

### Land Use

**[Land Use Statistics](/d/lindas-description?var-cube=https://ld.admin.ch/are/landuse)**
Land use categories and changes.
*Federal Office for Spatial Development*

---

**Can't find what you're looking for?** [Browse all LINDAS cubes](/d/lindas-browser) | [Search LINDAS directly](https://lindas.admin.ch)

*This catalog shows a curated selection of datasets. More datasets are available in the full LINDAS knowledge graph.*
